preparation.raw_text:
1. Weigh out 40 g of Magnesium (Mg). 
 2. Weigh out 80 g of Scandium (Sc). 
 3. Weigh out 80 g of Samarium (Sm). 
 4. Weigh out 160 g of Tin (Sn). 
 5. In a clean, dry container, combine all the weighed metals thoroughly.
